com.marklogic.semantics.jena

Class MarkLogicDatasetGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraphBase
      • com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraphBaseFind
        • com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraphTriplesQuads
          • com.marklogic.semantics.jena.MarkLogicDatasetGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraph, com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.Transactional, com.hp.hpl.jena.update.GraphStore, org.apache.jena.atlas.lib.Closeable

    public class MarkLogicDatasetGraph
extends com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraphTriplesQuads
implements com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraph, com.hp.hpl.jena.update.GraphStore, com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.Transactional
    A representation of MarkLogic's triple store as a DatasetGraph, plus a few extra MarkLogic-specific features. Use this class as you would any other DatasetGraph in a jena-based project. If you know you are using a MarkLogicDatasetGraph, simply cast it in order to use the MarkLogic-specific capabilities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarkLogicDatasetGraph

        public MarkLogicDatasetGraph(JenaDatabaseClient jenaClient)
        Creates a new MarkLogicDatasetGraph using the supplied DatabaseClient. If this client can write to the database, then the DatasetGraph is initialized with a default graph.
        Parameters:
        jenaClient - specifies the connection to the MarkLogic server. Obtain from DatabaseClientFactory.

      • bindObject

        public static com.marklogic.client.semantics.SPARQLQueryDefinition bindObject(com.marklogic.client.semantics.SPARQLQueryDefinition qdef,
                                                              java.lang.String variableName,
                                                              com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Node objectNode)
        Maps Jena bindings defined by a variable name and a Node to MarkLogic SPARQLQueryDefinition bindings.
        Parameters:
        qdef - A SPARQLQueryDefinition to decorate with a binding.
        variableName - Name of the variable
        objectNode - An RDF node with the value of variableName.
        Returns:
        The query definition, with binding set.

      • mergeGraph

        public void mergeGraph(com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Node graphName,
              com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Graph graph)
        Merges triples into a graph on the MarkLogic server. mergeGraph() is NOT part of Jena's DatasetGraph interface.
        Parameters:
        graphName - The graph to merge with server state.
        graph - The graph data.

      • sync

        public void sync()
        Forces the quads in the write cache to flush to the server.

      • setRulesets

        public void setRulesets(com.marklogic.client.semantics.SPARQLRuleset... rulesets)
        Specifies a set of inferencing rulesets to apply to a query. These rulesets either come with MarkLogic server or were installed by an administrator.
        Parameters:
        rulesets - Zero-or-more rulesets to apply to queries.

      • getRulesets

        public com.marklogic.client.semantics.SPARQLRuleset[] getRulesets()

        Returns:

      • setConstrainingQueryDefinition

        public void setConstrainingQueryDefinition(com.marklogic.client.query.QueryDefinition constrainingQueryDefinition)
        Sets a MarkLogic Java API QueryDefinition that is applied to SPARQL queries to restrict documents upon which queries are run.
        Parameters:
        constrainingQueryDefinition - A query definition. Use raw query definitions or QueryBuilder.

      • getConstrainingQueryDefinition

        Returns:

      • setSPARQLUpdatePermissions

        public void setSPARQLUpdatePermissions(com.marklogic.client.semantics.GraphPermissions permissions)
        Set the permissions for graphs created by this DatasetGraph during SPARQL update operations. Set to null for default permissions.
        Parameters:
        permissions - One or more permissions to add to graphs created during SPARQL updates.

      • getSPARQLUpdatePermissions

        public com.marklogic.client.semantics.GraphPermissions getSPARQLUpdatePermissions()
        Get the permissions that are to be written to new graphs during SPARQL update.
        Returns:
        the permissions associated with updates.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the connection to the database. After closing the DatabaseGraph, it can no longer be used for query or update.
        Specified by:
        close in interface com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.core.DatasetGraph
        Specified by:
        close in interface org.apache.jena.atlas.lib.Closeable
